title: Consolidate StocksHomePage hamburger menu to 5 dashboard-related sections

requirements.summary: Replace the StocksHomePage hamburger menu with a single consolidated menu that contains only the 5 specified navigation items.
acceptanceCriteria: On the main home page header, the hamburger menu opens a single menu panel.
The menu panel shows exactly 5 navigation items: "Dashboard", "Withdrawal", "Withdrawal History", "Admin Panel", and "Funds Transaction History".
The menu panel does not show any other items currently present (e.g., "Stocks & Funds", "Winning History", "Customer Care", "Customer Support").

file_operations.description: Update the menu panel UI to render exactly five items (Dashboard, Withdrawal, Withdrawal History, Admin Panel, Funds Transaction History) and remove all other existing menu actions/items (including customer care/support links). Ensure only one panel is used and adjust icon imports accordingly.

requirements.summary: Wire the consolidated menu items to the existing flowStore activeSection mechanism so each item switches the visible section and closes the menu.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking "Dashboard" sets the active section to the existing home/landing section and closes the menu.
Clicking "Withdrawal" sets the active section to "withdrawal" and closes the menu.
Clicking "Withdrawal History" sets the active section to "withdrawalHistory" and closes the menu.
Clicking "Admin Panel" sets the active section to "adminPanel" and closes the menu.
Clicking "Funds Transaction History" sets the active section to "fundsHistory" and closes the menu.

file_operations.description: Map the consolidated menu labels to the existing activeSection values (Dashboard->'home', Withdrawal->'withdrawal', Withdrawal History->'withdrawalHistory', Admin Panel->'adminPanel', Funds Transaction History->'fundsHistory') using the current flowStore setActiveSection flow, and ensure the menu closes on selection.

requirements.summary: Standardize funds history user-facing labels to use "Funds Transaction History" in the menu and the funds history section header.
acceptanceCriteria: In the consolidated menu, the item label reads "Funds Transaction History" (not "Funds History").
In the funds history section header, the main title uses "Funds Transaction History" in English.
No other section titles are unintentionally changed.

file_operations.description: Update the funds history navigation item label to "Funds Transaction History" while continuing to navigate to the existing 'fundsHistory' activeSection.
Change the funds history section heading/title text from "Funds History" to "Funds Transaction History" without altering other section headings or internal activeSection names.
